data.meta_site_name: World Music Central | Your Connection to traditional and contemporary World Music, including folk, roots, global music, ethno and crosscultural fusions
data.text:
Cidade Negra (Black City), is one of Brazilâ€™s most popular reggae groups, with great sold out shows at the legendary Maracana football arena. In Brazil their work was honored with several platinum awards. They gained international reputation by collaborations with Reggae and Dancehall superstars like Shabba Ranks and Patra and their appearance as the one of the few non-Jamaican artists at the Sunsplash festival.
